newsitem.title: USA: Celtrix raises $14 million in private deal.
newsitem.headline: Celtrix raises $14 million in private deal.

text.p: Celtrix Pharmaceuticals Inc on Friday said it had raised $14 million through a private equity placement to various unnamed U.S. and foreign institutional investors.

Celtrix expects to use the funds primarily to advance the clinical development of its lead compound, SomatoKine(R), as well as for general corporate purposes including product manufacturing and working capital.
The private placement consisted of approximately 5.7 million shares of Celtrix common stock, priced at current fair market value, along with three-year stock purchase warrants.
